law.catch_line: Variances, special exceptions and zoning changes.

text.section:
Sec. 33-322. Variances, special exceptions and zoning changes.
During the existence of any building moratorium, no applications for variances, special exceptions, zoning district changes, minimum square footage requirement changes, unusual and new uses, modifications or elimination of conditions, restrictions or limitations within the affected area shall be acted upon by any County agency, except as provided in(h), or, or unless otherwise specifically provided by the Board of County Commissioners by ordinance with regard to a specific moratorium.
